de.aitools.aq.algebra.vector.functions
Interface Distance<T>

Type Parameters:
T - The class of the objects of which the distance can be computed
All Superinterfaces:
Proximity<T>
All Known Implementing Classes:
EuclideanDistance, ManhattanDistance
public interface Distance<T>
extends Proximity<T>

A measure for computing how far away two objects are from each other.
The Proximity of a distance measure is most likely the negative distance.

Version:

Author:

Method Detail

computeDistance

Compute a kind of distance between two objects. A higher value signals higher distance.
